# Checkbox Lists

- [ ] This is unchecked
- [X] This is checked
- [ ] This is unchecked again
- [] This is not a checkbox

:cool:

```ruby
def func
  x = 1
end
```

*   This is a test

    ```javascript
    if a === 3 {
      b = 5
    }
    ```

```
function f(x) {
  return x++;
}
```

```kombucha
drink-that-stuff:
  tastes-weird~
```

```python
  bar


  baz
```
